title: High-Tech Grocery Stock Delivers More Food, Less Profit
sub_head: Ocado said costs will be higher than expected this year as it burns through cash to get automated warehouses up and running for supermarket clients like Kroger
body:
Supermarket stocks have been a good investment during the pandemic. The British tech company that is leading the grocery industryâ€™s global shift online, less so.
On Tuesday, shares in Ocado fell 12% after the e-commerce pioneer told shareholders that steep losses in its international business will continue in its 2022 fiscal year, despite plans to more than double revenue.
